title: Vaishnavi Polki Kundan Cocktail Ring - A Blossoming Splendor
features: This stunning ring features a flower-inspired design with a central Polki diamond surrounded by alternating emeralds and Polki diamonds. The detailed Kundan setting showcases the natural beauty of the uncut diamonds. The band has delicate engraving. Intricate enamel work can be seen in the back of the ring enhancing its beauty.
occasions: and upscale cocktail parties. A statement piece to elevate any outfit.
description: This Polki Kundan cocktail ring is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of uncut Polki diamonds and vibrant green emeralds creates a captivating contrast. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, making it a heirloom-worthy piece that will be cherished for generations. A fusion of traditional and modern design for the contemporary woman.
